# Metal Skin (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]], [[5th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 5]] (metal)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a small piece of rhinoceros hide)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC), pg. 115

When you cast this spell, the recipient’s skin toughens and gleams as if metallic, and it gains a natural armor bonus of +8. The target becomes somewhat slow and stiff, taking a –2 penalty to Dexterity.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 5, Wizard 5 to Level.
